abstract: Some questions facing Amazon and its partners as they prepare for the introduction of a large-screen Kindle reading device.
snippet: Some questions facing Amazon and its partners as they prepare for the introduction of a large-screen Kindle reading device.
lead_paragraph: Our article on Monday asked whether a new wave of large-screen digital reading devices could help the ailing magazine and newspaper industries. It talked about a new large-screen version of Amazon’s Kindle device, tailored for reading periodicals and textbooks, which the company will formally unveil at a press conference on Wednesday morning in New York City. Here are a few questions I’m mulling as I prepare to cover the event.

headline.main: Questions for Amazon at the Kindle 3 Event
